root.name: The Sims 2: Mansion & Garden Stuff
root.description: is the ninth and final stuff pack for the Sims 2. It is also EA's last game that supported Windows 98 and Windows 2000. It was released in North America on November 17, 2008. It was released in Europe and Australia on November 21, 2008. The pack includes exclusive decoration for gardens like flowers,bushes,tree and giant mushrooms, as well as features new roof types. The three decoration styles that are included: Moroccan, art deco, and colonial empire. In total The Sims 2: Mansion Garden Stuff includes 60 items.
